snippet.title: Make Playtime Your Own with Tamagotchi Pix!
snippet.description:
Tamagotchi Pix is the newest generation of your favorite interactive virtual pet. For the first time ever, the Tamagotchi device has a camera and touch buttons! While maintaining its core Tamagotchi attributes of nurturing, communication, portability, and gaming, your virtual pet is better than ever! Use the camera to help nurture your character by cooking its meals, customizing different items, exploring to find over 100 Tamagotchi friends, and so much more. Plus, you can even take pictures WITH your Tamagotchi character! The new touch buttons allow you to interact with your character in ways like never before. You can also connect with your friend’s Tamagotchi Pix using a Tama code, and even plan character play dates for a later time.
 
WHERE TO ORDER YOUR TAMAGOTCHI PIX: 💖 
• Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/Tamagotchi-Pix-Floral-Pink-42901/dp/B08XWKGQ9H
• Walmart: https://www.walmart.com/ip/Tamagotchi-Pix-Pink-Electronic-Pets/406103042
• Target: https://www.target.com/p/tamagotchi-pix-purple/-/A-81958098
• Best Buy: https://www.bestbuy.com/site/bandai-tamagotchi-pix-pink/6460286.p?skuId=6460286
 
DON’T FORGET TO SUBSCRIBE: 
• YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiGPwNVXrbT7hcO8bLJXfdw
 
FOLLOW US TO SEE WHAT’S HATCHING NEXT: 
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tamagotchiusa/
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tamagotchi_us/
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/Tamagotchi_US/
